summary: AN ORDINANCE related to monorail transit, authorizing the Mayor to execute an agreement with the Seattle Popular Monorail Authority to allow the non-exclusive use of certain City of Seattle streets and rights-of-way for the Seattle Monorail Green Line Project, authorizing the Mayor to execute further agreements pursuant to and consistent with that agreement, directing that approvals of new monorail transit facilities be consistent with that agreement, authorizing certain areas of the public rights-of-way to be designated as a Monorail Transit Way, and authorizing the Seattle Design Commission to delegate certain of its functions.
note: Green Line Transit Way Agreement, Green Line Transitway Agreement
